name: Blood Moon (RAMUSEEELE)
description:
==+=. BLOOD MOON .=+==

Blood Moon is a 2D platform videogame with clear roguelike style .

It is our first project, and it has been developed during two exhaustive weeks for San Valero's GameJam 2018.

The main purpose of our game is to explore and discover the mysterious adventure that surrounds our knight. Blood Moon offers a hard and exigent experience and , in exchange for the satisfaction of overcoming a difficult challenge.

In this title, the platforms take a very important role, and that is why we focus our efforts on achieving an agile and comfortable movement for our character. On the contrary, the combat is focused with a slower style, where you must think carefully how and when to act if you want to be

CONTROLS -A & D >   Movement - -P  > Attack (maintain)- -F   >  Dash (keep)-    -T   >  Transformation-    -ESC  >    Exit- TIPS

1. Do not underestimate any enemy, anyone can defeat you if you are not careful
2. Explore thoroughly, the map includes secrets, but be careful where you step!
3. It is VERY advisable to take all the chests you find ...

We hope you enjoy our first game as much as we have enjoyed doing it, see you in the pit!
